message_1:
What is the median of the following data set? 

6, 8, 9, 10, 12, 14, 15, 22, 50 

This question requires the student to find the middle value in a set of data that is not affected by outliers, which is a concept in robust statistics.
message_2:
To find the median of the given data set, first, arrange the numbers in ascending order, which has already been done:

6, 8, 9, 10, 12, 14, 15, 22, 50

Since there are 9 numbers in the data set (an odd number), the median will be the middle value. In this case, the median is the 5th number:

6, 8, 9, 10, 12, 14, 15, 22, 50

The median of this data set is 12.
